state_description: This screen shows the results of a completed system junk scan, displaying the amount of space that can be freed up by removing user cache files and other system junk.
done: Scan completed, 1.91 GB identified for cleaning

enables.name: Review Details
enables.description: View detailed information about the files identified during the scan.

enables.name: Clean
enables.description: Initiate the cleaning process to remove the identified system junk files.

enables.name: Start Over
enables.description: Restart the system junk scan process.
